name: Operation: Stardust
description:
This is a game developed in about a month for a software studio course, using a rather obscure game engine called Cocos Creator. Previously hosted on a Firebase server. Moved to itch for better visibility.

Features a local versus mode,  where you can fight against a second human player or a computer AI, or even watch two computer AI battle it out.

There are no plans for further development or maintenance, but we hope you enjoy the game nonetheless.

Controls
  • Hold down right mouse button to drag the camera around.
  • Left click to select units or tiles.
  • Press the Escape key (Esc) to pause. Use the pause menu to end the turn.
